idea-plugin.name: True Dark
idea-plugin.description:
True Dark Theme Collection

A collection of high-contrast themes with the purest blacks and highest readability for JetBrains IDEs.

Features:

  • True Black: Pure #000000 black background with maximum contrast
  • True Dark: Slightly softer dark theme for extended coding sessions
  • True Light: High-contrast light theme based on the same design principles
  • Optimized for OLED/AMOLED displays
  • Beautiful Xcode-inspired syntax highlighting
  • Carefully crafted UI element colors for maximum visibility
  • Custom high-contrast icon colors

Perfect for:

  • Late-night coding sessions
  • Developers with visual preferences for high contrast
  • OLED display users looking to save battery
  • Anyone who loves a clean, minimalist IDE appearance

Say goodbye to eye strain and hello to the purest dark theme experience!
